name: Wukong: Birth of the Monkey King
name_original: Wukong: Birth of the Monkey King
description:
A fast-paced action-platformer hack-n-slash where you play as Sun Wukong, mythical king of the monkeys as you fight to free your brethren who have been turned to stone.

FREE YOUR KINGDOM
Your kingdom of monkeys has been enslaved, imprisoned in these statues. You are born - the Monkey King - on a quest to free them all - by fighting them.

TAKE BACK WHAT'S YOURS

Duck, dodge, fight, weave and jump through a series of challenging levels and action sequences to reclaim your kingdom - and set your sights on the one who imprisoned them in the first place.

FAST-PACED ACTION

With a combat system inspired by old-school hack and slash games, with modern elements sprinkled in like free-flow targeting and dodging, you're free to exercise your skills on the battlefield with your badass martial arts - or die trying.

CONTROLS

  • LMB/Gamepad Left Face Button: Light Attack
  • RMB/Gamepad Top Face Button: Heavy Attack
  • Hold RMB: Throw Staff
  • E/Gamepad Right Face Button: Dodge
  • WASD/Gamepad Left Stick: Move
  • Mouse/Gamepad Right Stick: Look
  • CTRL/Gamepad Left Stick Button: Slide
  • Shift/Gamepad Right Trigger: Sprint
  • Space/Gamepad Bottom Face Button: Jump
  • F/Gamepad Left Shoulder Button: Sun Burst
  • Q/Gamepad Right Shoulder Button: Heal
  • C/Gamepad Right Stick Button: Rage Mode
  • Escape/P/Gamepad Start Button: Pause
